text.autoconfig.cherished-trades.title: Cherished Trades
Shows a bookmark icon next to villager trades, allowing you to mark your favorite trades.
Highlights trades with especially good prices, such as cheap enchanted books.
Allows slightly higher prices to still count as a good deal. For example: an offset of 2 means 'lowest price + 2'.
List of enchantments you want to highlight in villager trades. Type full name like 'Sharpness 5'.
